title: Volatility time series modeling by single-qubit quantum circuit learning
summary: This study proposes a quantum machine learning approach using single-qubit quantum circuits to model and forecast financial market volatility time series.

title: Reinforcement Learning in Financial Decision Making: A Systematic Review of Performance Challenges and Implementation Strategies
summary: This systematic review analyzes reinforcement learning applications in financial decision making, covering market making, portfolio optimization, algorithmic trading, and implementation challenges.

title: The Distributional Consequences of Paid-Priority Queues
summary: This note examines the distributional implications of introducing a fast-track queue for accessing a service when agents are heterogeneous in both income and service valuation.
